review: My husband bought this for his work truck. He works in the oil field and has to be in his truck for a lot of the day. This has really helped him keep on top of his reports and computer work. He used to set the computer on his lap and that hurt his wrist, or on the dash which hurt his back. This helps him keep good posture and accomplish his daily tasks in less time.It doesn't have any unpleasant scent, the edges are all smooth, and it fits well on the steering wheel.
productTitle: Zone Tech Car Ipad Laptop/Eating Steering Wheel Desk
